title: How to fix a dark grey header background in Blogger - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many ways to do so. First look at the theme that you have applied. Is the band due to that. If so, in Theme> Customize> Advanced look for header background. Change that. You can also go to Layout from the main menu. In the layout, look for Header gadget. Click on it. You can place an image behind the header information or in front. Depending on the theme, there could be different options to customize the header. There are other, more complicated ways. These involve change in CSS of the blog. Let us skip them here.
